Description.Text: Located in Downtown Ottawa, this hotel is within a 10-minute walk of Currency Museum and Supreme Court of Canada. Parliament Hill and National Gallery of Canada are also within 1 mile. The nearest airport is Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier International Airport, 6.8 miles from Alt Hotel Ottawa. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with Wi-Fi access, flat-screen TV, coffee making facility and a private bathroom with shower, toiletries and hairdryer. The hotel features a 24-hour front desk and a fitness centre. The Altcetera Caf√© serves a variety of snacks and beverages as well as hot and cold meals for breakfast, lunch and dinner.
